wblut.hemesh

Class HEC_FromPolygons

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEC_Creator
        • wblut.hemesh.HEC_FromPolygons

  • public class HEC_FromPolygons
extends HEC_Creator
    Creates a new mesh from a list of polygons. Duplicate vertices are fused.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
